tosdr.case: Your profile is combined across various products

title: Your profile is combined across various products
quoteText:
This type of service allows the Owner to build user profiles by starting from an email address, a personal name, or other information that the User provides to Doxy.me, as well as to track User activities through analytics features.
This Personal Data may also be matched with publicly available information about the User (such as social networks' profiles) and used to build private profiles that the Owner can display and use for improving Doxy.me.
